description: George Russell (Car 63) left the track at Turns 10-11 and gained a lasting advantage by overtaking Car 23 without giving the position back.

decision_notes: The Stewards reviewed data, video, timing, team radio and in-car video evidence. Car 63 deliberately left the track at Turn 10 and overtook Car 23. description: Collision between Car 1 (Max Verstappen) and Car 16 (Charles Leclerc) on the start/finish straight during the race. Stewards investigated and decided to take no further action.

description: Max Verstappen (Car 1) left the track at Turn 1 after contact with George Russell (Car 63) but no penalty was given.
rule_violated: Article 33.3 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations
decision_notes: Car 63 attempted to overtake Car 1 on the inside of Turn 1. While the front axle of Car 63 was ahead of the mirror of Car 1 at the apex, the driver of Car 63 momentarily lost control of the car and collided with Car 1, forcing it wide and into the escape road. Car 1 re-entered the track at Turn 3 ahead of Car 63. Given that the reason for Car 1 being forced off the track was the loss of control and the resulting contact by Car 63, Car 1 did not deliberately leave the track.

penalty_given: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
rule_violated: Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations
decision_notes: Oracle Red Bull Racing changed the setup of the suspension of Car 22 under Parc Ferme, this not being in accordance with Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Oracle Red Bull Racing changed the rear wing specification of Car 22 under Parc Ferme with the approval of the Technical Delegate in accordance with Article 40.3 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. However, the assembly is of a different specification, which is a breach of Article 40.9 and Car 22 is required to start the Race from pit lane.
